mdRecord.dcterms:title: Receipt to C. M. Stigleman from Horstmann Brothers and Company Philadelphia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Receipt to C. M. Stigleman from Horstmann Brothers and Company Philadelphia for purchase of sword, belt, epaulettes, etc. for goods to outfit an officer of the militia. 1 original piece.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Records and correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
